altTitles.ja: あねっポイの-my sister, like sister-

altTitles.ja-ro: Aneppoi no: my sister, like sister

description.en:
Mutsumi Natsukage, or Mutsu-nee for short, is my cousin who's "like an older sister, but not my older sister" and she's a university student. She's freeloading with us because it's convenient for her commute. Anyway, Mutsu-nee and I are close and her skinship is relentless. She comes over to my room every night to play, and with her shapely legs and arms carelessly on display, I just don't know where to look.

One day, Mutsu-nee scooted over to mess with me while I was studying, and startled by her pleasant scent, I panicked and shouted at her. She has stopped coming over to play in my room since then. At around the same time, I also began to see her happily fiddling with her phone, and she also started letting her hair down, which she usually kept tied up.

I asked Mutsu-nee if she found herself a boyfriend... to which she only gave me vague replies. I lost my cool and dragged her to my room, and pushed her down on my bed.

The thought of her being taken away by another man after all this time, when I've kept her company up until now is just...
I let my true feelings for Mutsu-nee, who will end up leaving for somewhere, spill out while I was unable to get my emotions in order...

(Source: FANZA)

description.ja:
むつ姉――夏影むつみは『あねっぽいけどあねじゃない』いとこの大学生。通学に便利だからと家に居候中だ。むつ姉はとにかく距離が近く、スキンシップが激しい。毎晩部屋に遊びに来てはムチムチした肢体を無防備にさらけ出し目のやり場に困っている。
ある日ちょっかいを出してきたむつ姉、いい匂いに驚き邪険に扱ってしまい、以来むつ姉は部屋に遊びに来なくなった。
それと同時にむつ姉は機嫌良く携帯を弄るようになり、普段縛っていた髪をおろすようになった。
もしや彼氏が…と問いただすと曖昧な返事をするむつ姉。カッとなり部屋に連れ込みベッドに押し倒す。
今まで自分に構ってくれていた今更他の男に取られるなんて…自分の気持ちに整理がつかないまま何処かに行ってしまうむつ姉に対しての思いが溢れ出てしまい…
